channel.title: Starting Server?
channel.description: Ok, I have a server made, InnerScape.no-ip.org, but how do I start it? Just hit "Start server"? If thats the case how do other people join. Would they just go to File> New Server and type in innerscape.no-ip.org??? When they make an account would I have the notepad "charcater info" there? Please help :)[br][size=1]Posted at: August 31, 2006, 08:45:59 PM[/size][hr]Please help >>[br][size=1]Posted at: August 31, 2006, 10:08:09 PM[/size][hr]:( Still no help...

item.title: Starting Server?

They’re two .bat files which compile and run, if you have any common sense.

item.title: Starting Server?

item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

If thats the case how do other people join. Would they just go to File> New Server and type in innerscape.no-ip.org???

This is all right.

But to set up the server, just finish all the instructions here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,643.0.html
